Dero stalkers are those charged with exploring the surface world by night and seeking out new victims to abduct. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11 [Dero Stalker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=105) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 84 **Perception** +5; darkvision **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +3, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +8 **Str** +2 **Dex** +4 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** -1 **Cha** +1 **Items** [Aklys](/Weapons.aspx?ID=85), [Giant Centipede Venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=113) (4 doses), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (20 bolts) --- **AC** 19 **Fort** +7 **Ref** +10 **Will** +3 **HP** 30 **Weaknesses** vulnerable to sunlight **Vulnerable to Sunlight** A dero stalker takes 4 damage for every hour they’re exposed to sunlight.
**Nimble Dodge** **Requirements** The dero stalker is not encumbered. **Trigger** A creature targets the dero with an attack and the dero can see the attacker. **Effect** The dero dodges out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** aklys +8 ([Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning **Ranged** aklys +10 ([Ranged Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=251), [Tethered](/Traits.aspx?ID=252), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning **Ranged** hand crossbow +10 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6 piercing plus [giant centipede venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=113) **Occult Innate Spells** DC 17 - **Cantrips (1st)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132) **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** A dero stalker deals 1d6 extra precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.
